mapper.select: SELECT c.*, p.category_name AS parent_category_name FROM Category c LEFT JOIN Category p ON c.parent_category_id = p.category_id WHERE c.created_by = #{userId} ORDER BY c.updated_at DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM Category WHERE parent_category_id = #{parentId} AND created_by = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM Category WHERE category_level = 1 AND created_by = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Category (category_name, parent_category_id, description, category_level, created_at, updated_at,sort_key,created_by) VALUES (#{categoryName}, #{parentCategoryId}, #{description}, #{categoryLevel}, NOW(),NOW(),#{sortKey},#{createdBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE Category SET category_name = #{categoryName}, parent_category_id = #{parentCategoryId}, description = #{description}, category_level = #{categoryLevel}, updated_at = NOW(), created_at =NOW(), created_by =#{createdBy} WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
UPDATE Category SET sort_key=#{sortKey}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
